Detailed Description

An set up for the win/lose animation.

Member Function Documentation

def Animation::Animation::__init__ (   self  ) 

animation constructor

setup the background pictures, the dynamic animation pictures, transfer them into proper size, with win/lose, respectively. Then assign the win/lose animation pictures randomly among the blocks of the boad.

def Animation::Animation::loose (   self,
  screen 
)

lose animation setup

randomly appen the number of the animation pictures into the board, then make the rain animation

Parameters:
screen assign the lose animation to the screen on which it is needed

def Animation::Animation::win (   self,
  screen 
)

win animation setup

randomly appen the number of the animation pictures into the board, then make the rain animation

Parameters:
screen assign the winning animation to the screen on which it is needed
